sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the National Guard Veterans Exposure to Hazardous Materials Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the National Guard Veterans Exposure to Hazardous Materials Act.

sections.heading: Assistance in obtaining information on treatment
sections.text: On and after October 1, 2007, the Department of Veterans' Affairs shall assist any eligible member or veteran who (i) has been assigned a risk level I, II, or III for depleted uranium exposure by his or her branch of service, (ii) is referred by a mi

sections.heading: Certification concerning National Guard information
sections.text: On or before October 1, 2007, the Adjutant General shall certify to the General Assembly that members of the Illinois National Guard are informed of possible health risks associated with exposure to depleted uranium. The certification shall apply

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
